tool_contract.description:
Juliet, minimal minor variant calling software.
Attention: Juliet is for research usage only. Predictions have not been validated.

input_types.description: Consensus (CCS) Alignment DataSet or aligned .bam file
input_types.title: AlignmentSet

tool_contract.name: juliet

output_types.description: Human-readable HTML report generated by juliet
output_types.title: HTML Report

schema_options.description: Debug returns all amino acids, irrelevant of their significance.
schema_options.name: Debug

schema_options.description: Deletion Rate, specify to override the learned rate.
schema_options.name: Deletion Rate

schema_options.description: Only report variants that confer drug resistance, as listed in the target configuration file.
schema_options.name: Only Report Variants in Target Config

schema_options.description: Clip reads to this genomic region. Empty means all reads.
schema_options.name: Region of Interest

schema_options.description: Substitution Rate, specify to override the learned rate.
schema_options.name: Substitution Rate

schema_options.description: Predefined target config tag, one of "none" or "HIV_HXB2".
schema_options.name: Target Config

schema_options.description: Path to the target config JSON file, predefined target config tag, or the JSON string.
schema_options.name: Target Config
